text: viśvasiccavarē, niṅṅaḷ sampādicca uttama ‎vastukkaḷilninnuṁ niṅṅaḷkku nāṁ bhūmiyil ‎utpādippiccutannatil ninnuṁ niṅṅaḷ celavaḻikkuka. ‎kaṇṇaṭaccukeāṇṭallāte niṅṅaḷkku tanne ‎svīkarikkānāvātta cītta vastukkaḷ dānaṁ ‎ceyyānāyi karutivekkarut. aṟiyuka: allāhu ‎an'yāśrayamillāttavanuṁ stutyarhanumāṇ. ‎
